content:
Laid-Back Luxury With The Best of Key West

The Marker experience embraces barefoot luxury, immersing guests in a tranquil hideaway that brims with upscale amenities in an utterly unpretentious setting with easy access to area shopping, dining and sightseeing.  Visitors are greeted by gorgeously landscaped tropical grounds, and ascend a grand staircase to a chic lobby with towering glass windows that invite private glimpses of Key West's natural beauty.  Plush guest rooms, 3 oasis-like pools, a state-of-the-art fitness center, and an onsite restaurant for dinner and drinks are all designed with maximum relaxation in mind.

The Marker sets a new bar for luxury resorts in Key West. Our timeless dedication to the hospitality is matched only by a modern approach that imbues classic elegance with the breezy warmth of the Florida Keys.

Expect the best.  Unwind in style.

Marker Resort April Newsletter
